        ADDRESS

        225 Jinheung-ro, Eunpyeong-gu, Seoul, 122-707, Korea
        Tel. 82-2-3156-7000 / Fax. 82-2-3156-7007
        Subway
        Bulgwang station (Line No.3 and 6). Take exit 2 and walk 300m in the direction of Gugi Tunnel. KWDI is on the left.
        Bus
        Bulgwangdong stop. Walk 300m in the direction of Gugi Tunnel. KWDI is on the left.
        Car
        At Bulgwang station intersection, drive towards Gugi Tunnel for 300m. Make a U-turn in front of the Korea Institute for Health and Social Affairs to enter KWDI.
